mapper.select: SELECT o.order_num, o.payment_type, o.delivery_how, o.order_type, o.order_status, o.member_num , i.item_name, i.item_image, i.item_price, i.dselect, i.member_num , m.member_name, m.member_id, m.member_phone, p.due_date, p.payment_date, p.purchase_ok, p.purchase_num, o.delivery_fee FROM anvd_order o JOIN purchase p ON o.order_num = p.order_num JOIN item i ON o.item_num = i.item_num JOIN member m ON o.member_num = m.member_num WHERE o.order_num = #{orderNum}
